title: Update footer phone number
constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only components).
Keep all backend logic within the single Motoko actor (backend/main.mo); do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: Do not change any other footer content (links, social icons, branding text) beyond the phone number.
Do not change shared itinerary branding settings or any admin configuration flows.
